description:
Crafted from sustainably minded materials, these waterproof boots delivers the style and comfort Timberland is known for. Insulated with efficient Primaloft® and lined with a waterproof breathable layer, these boots will keep your feet warm and dry while braving the elements.Uppers are fabric and leather from a tannery rated Silver or higher by The Leather Working Group. Tanneries are assessed based on energy use, waste production and water treatment.ReBOTL recycled fabric wicks moisture away from the foot.TimberDry™ waterproof breathable membrane is made from 50% post-consumer recycled material.400g PrimaLoft synthetic insulation.Padded collar adds comfort.Aggressive tread helps keep you anchored.To date Timberland has re-purposed more 445 metric tons of plastic waste in their products.

        Sustainability









                      Leather Working Group leather














                      Recycled content
name: Timberland Premium 6" Waterproof Rebotl Boots - Men's
